citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 on
01Feb2024.
The licensee was called and he was not going to be in the area for several hours.
This is the first attempted inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 on 
01Feb2024. 
 
The licensee was called and he was not going to be in the area for several hours.  
 
This is the first attempted inspection. 
 
 
End Section
